Name: Noahmund
About the game: Love, fear, and fire… The war in Feros drives the fate of Galina Angstroud, an agent of Shinn who takes up the battle to fight against the most powerful weapon of Salaber. Accompanied by her guardian, Berani Valenti, she embarks on a journey for the truth and salvation. Explore a huge dungeon through a classic board game node-based exploration system and solve puzzles with main characters unique skills! Fight with Motion Battle Chess! The revolutionary battle system that mixes real time action with tactical grids. Discover a new mythology created from zero, driven by a powerful story and accompanied twice awarded soul-touching soundtrack.
